casebody.data:
IN RE: B.E. M. 56P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 26, 2018 Joshua Howell, Attorney at Law, for Rutherford County DSS. Lee F. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Marion, for B.M. Brian Oglesby, Attorney at Law, Rutherfordton, for Bridges, Dexter. David L. Coldren, for Coldren, David. Michelle P. Coldren, for Coldren, Michelle.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of February 2018 by Petitioners (David L. Coldren and Michelle) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of February 2018."
